scripts.local:migrate: npm run generate && wrangler d1 migrations apply boilerplate-db-local --local
scripts.local:deploy: npm run local:migrate && npm run dev
scripts.preview:migrate: npm run generate && wrangler d1 migrations apply $(node -e "console.log(require('../package.json').name)")-db-preview --env preview --remote
scripts.preview:deploy: npm run preview:migrate && wrangler deploy --env preview
scripts.prod:migrate: npm run generate && wrangler d1 migrations apply $(node -e "console.log(require('../package.json').name)")-db --env prod --remote
scripts.prod:deploy: npm run prod:migrate && wrangler deploy --env prod
scripts.db:studio: LOCAL_DB_PATH=$(find .wrangler/state/v3/d1/miniflare-D1DatabaseObject -type f -name '*.sqlite' -exec ls -t {} + | head -n1) drizzle-kit studio
